verses.name: Luke 22:20
verses.text: Likewise also the cup after supper, saying, This cup is the new testament in my blood, which is shed for you.

verses.name: Luke 22:21
verses.text: But, behold, the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table.

verses.name: Luke 22:22
verses.text: And truly the Son of man goeth, as it was determined: but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed!

verses.name: Luke 22:23
verses.text: And they began to enquire among themselves, which of them it was that should do this thing.

verses.name: Luke 22:24
verses.text: And there was also a strife among them, which of them should be accounted the greatest.
